He has not had any dysuria or flank pain. He has a history of hypertension, calcium pyrophosphate crystal arthritis, and alcoholic cirrhosis. Current medications include hydrochlorothiazide, rifaximin, lactulose, and naproxen as needed for the joint pain. He quit drinking 5 years ago. He does not smoke cigarettes. Calcium 11.8 mg/dL
Phosphorus 2.1 mg/dL

Albumin 3.1 g/dL
AST 53 U/L
ALT 43 U/L
